introduction: A motivated and tech-savvy developer with over 8+ years of experience working in modern front and backend development technologies. Skills include React.js, Next.js, Redux, Node.js, O365, AWS. Able to communicate effectively with a team, customers and very keen to develop more professional & technical skills in modern machine learning and AI technologies as well as cloud technologies.
